snippet: Members of both parties in the Texas House get to choose between cooperation and resistance in the new legislative session.
lead_paragraph: Members of both parties in the Texas House get to choose between cooperation and resistance in the new legislative session.

headline.seo: In Texas House, Balancing Act for Democrats and Republicans
headline.main: Small Shift in Numbers Gives House Democrats a Fresh Shot at Relevance
headline.print_headline: Small Shift in Numbers Gives House Democrats a Fresh Shot at Relevance
